data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Release Form / Liability Waiver (Legal Protection). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Pre-Appointment Checklist (Task Completion Tracking). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Intake Form (Pre-Appointment Data Collection). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
